Toothbrush with built-in detector: This toothbrush would have a small device built into the handle that detects when the user is brushing too hard and alerts them to take it easy on their gums.

Toothbrush with an app: This toothbrush would come with an accompanying app that tracks the user's brushing habits, provides personalized recommendations for improving their oral hygiene routine, and even gamifies the brushing experience with rewards and challenges.

Toothbrush with UV sterilization: This toothbrush would have a built-in UV light that kills off any germs and bacteria on the bristles, providing an extra layer of protection against oral health issues.

Toothbrush with adjustable pressure sensors: This toothbrush would have sensors that detect the pressure the user is applying while brushing and adjust the bristles accordingly to provide the optimal amount of pressure for each individual's mouth.

Toothbrush with a built-in floss holder: This toothbrush would have a built-in floss holder that allows the user to easily floss while brushing, making it easier to maintain a complete oral hygiene routine.
